name: The thicker you paint, the more it flows
description: Detail of  "Portrait of Léon Delafosse" by John Singer Sargent, interpreted by neural networks trained on the human face, fading to original. | Assisted by artificial intelligence I interrogate the correlation between art, realism and beauty by uploading classic and contemporary works to a generative adversarial network | artist: Bas Uterwijk (@ganbrood) | medium: aPNG, 900x1200 pixels | original creation date: June 10, 2021
